name: Fantasy Mosaics 2
description:
Your journey to the fantasy land continues with this new fun collection of mosaics puzzles!
Discover the fantasy images intricately woven into 100 custom built levels and enjoy new innovative features
that enhance the gameplay and add to the fun. Embrace the challenge of mosaics and build your new fantasy garden!

- 100 custom built puzzles also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- breathtaking locations

- A unique fantasy atmosphere

- Restore your fantasy garden
